医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
适应性正念训练计划能否改善内感受和 DASH 饮食的坚持？经过调整的正念训练计划可改善内感受和 DASH 饮食的坚持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Can-an-adapted-mindativity-training-program-improve-interoception-and-adherence-to-the-DASH-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Can-an-adapted-mindativity-training-program-improve-interoception-and-adherence-to-the-DASH-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb2a8d9f-b077-4997-a202-dd409db1557b Mon, 06 Nov 2023 04:32:00 -0500 Can an adapted mindfulness training program improve interoception and adherence to the DASH diet?
研究探讨父亲心理健康与儿童行为、认知问题之间的联系虽然母亲的压力、焦虑和抑郁对儿童行为和认知发展的作用已广为人知，但人们对父亲的心理健康与儿童发展之间的联系知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-explores-link- Between-paternal-mental-health-and-behavioral-cognitive-problems-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-explores-link- Between-paternal-mental-health-and-behavioral-cognitive-problems-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c691d892-730c-4e2f-803c-ec23238b737d Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:30:00 -0500 Study explores link between paternal mental health and behavioral, cognitive problems in children
尖端“精准医学”显示出改善糖尿病护理的巨大潜力一个国际科学家联盟在对全球该领域现状的全面评估中报告称，尖端的“精准医学”在推进不同形式糖尿病的诊断、治疗和最终预防方面具有巨大潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Cutting-edge- precision-medicine-shows-great-pottial-to-improve-diabetes-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Cutting-edge- precision-medicine-shows-great-pottial-to-improve-diabetes-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cbc79dd-0dc3-4f16-acff-ef3accaa813a Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:26:00 -0500 Cutting-edge 'precision medicine' shows great potential to improve diabetes care
AIHW 报告：极端高温是澳大利亚大多数与天气相关的伤害的原因澳大利亚健康与福利研究所 (AIHW) 的一份新报告显示，过去十年，因极端天气造成的伤害入院的人数有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AIHW-report-Extreme-heat-responsible-for-most-weather-lated-injuries-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AIHW-report-Extreme-heat-responsible-for-most-weather-lated-injuries-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbd12306-68e9-46ba-8331-a69ce2f52223 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:21:00 -0500 AIHW report: Extreme heat responsible for most weather-related injuries in Australia
拜耳数字健康 UKI 推出新技术帮助 2 型糖尿病患者管理肾脏健康拜耳数字医疗保健 UKI 今天宣布推出其首个数字患者支持包“我的肾脏助手”，旨在为 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 患者提供信息和资源，以帮助监测和改善他们的肾脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Bayer-Digital-Health-UKI-introduces-new-technology-to-help-type-2-diabetes-病人-manage-kidney-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Bayer-Digital-Health-UKI-introduces-new-technology-to-help-type-2-diabetes-病人-manage-kidney-health.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c7fdefb-6a1e-47c2-8c68-9bb85778ba6c Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:19:00 -0500 Bayer Digital Health UKI introduces new technology to help type 2 diabetes patients manage kidney health
人工智能系统可以加速腹腔镜手术培训得益于赫瑞瓦特大学国家机器人中心的研究人员与邓迪医疗模拟研究所合作开发的人工智能系统，学习腹腔镜（或锁孔）手术的实习外科医生将很快能够更快地完成培训邓迪大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-empowered-system-may-accelerate-laparooscopy-surgery-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/AI-empowered-system-may-accelerate-laparooscopy-surgery-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfbdd8bf-d0ad-4d35-a066-4b68d13ffbc8 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:16:00 -0500 AI-empowered system may accelerate laparoscopic surgery training
新的运动试验旨在改善类风湿关节炎患者的生活质量类风湿性关节炎是一种炎症性疾病，可导致关节剧烈疼痛和肿胀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-exercise-trial-aims-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-exercise-trial-aims-to-improve-quality-of-life-for-people-with-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a214c9d4-6917-47c1-9691-06b0029f4371 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:10:00 -0500 New exercise trial aims to improve quality of life for people with rheumatoid arthritis
研究探讨低热量甜味剂对肠道健康的隐藏影响该研究仔细研究了低热量和无热量甜味剂对肠道微生物群的影响，表明其与葡萄糖耐量和胰岛素抵抗之间存在潜在联系，不同研究的结果不同，表明需要进行更全面的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Study-probes-the-hidden-impact-of-low-cal-sweeteners-on-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Study-probes-the-hidden-impact-of-low-cal-sweeteners-on-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b27367e-2db9-48b1-83f0-e492183c8a47 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:54:00 -0500 Study probes the hidden impact of low-cal sweeteners on gut health
工业界和学术界联合支持方酸单酰胺的合成作为药物发现的基础材料Asynt 与金斯顿大学和 Key Organics 合作开发了一个易于使用的新型合成化合物库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Industry-academia-combine-to-support-synthesis-of-squaric-acid-monoamides-as-building-blocks-for-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Industry-academia-combine-to-support-synthesis-of-squaric-acid-monoamides-as-building-blocks-for-drug-discovery.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b6e2eb0-231e-4c0c-b059-2f004a3ada0f Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:51:00 -0500 Industry & academia combine to support synthesis of squaric acid monoamides as building blocks for drug discovery
戒除烟瘾：戒烟五年后口腔微生物群恢复正常研究发现，吸烟有利于厌氧菌，从而重塑口腔微生物群，可能会导致健康风险，但如果戒烟五年以上，这种影响可能会逆转，恢复与不吸烟者相似的微生物群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Kicking-the-habit-Oral-microbiota-bounces-back- Five-years-after-quitting-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Kicking-the-habit-Oral-microbiota-bounces-back- Five-years-after-quitting-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=158667da-5cff-4605-87e1-856a6dbc267a Sun, 05 Nov 2023 23:34:00 -0500 Kicking the habit: Oral microbiota bounces back five years after quitting smoking
